form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Padilla (for himself, Mr. Markey, Mr. Sanders, Mr. Blumenthal, Ms. Warren, and Mr. Wyden) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to remove the overtime wages exemption for certain employees, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Guaranteeing Overtime for Truckers Act.

section.header: Amendment to the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938
section.text: Section 13(b)(1) of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 (29 U.S.C. 213(b)(1)) is repealed.
